ArmorCooldown.Name: Armor Cooldown
ArmorCooldown.Tip: You must wait to use your armor bonus again.
ArmorCooldown.TipTranslation: 你要过段时间才能再次使用护甲的奖励.

DemonBonus.Name: Demonic Overdrive
DemonBonus.TipTranslation: 你觉得你的能量没有极限

SSJSBuff.Name: Super Saiyan Spectrum
SSJSBuff.Tip:
69x Damage, 69x Speed, Gives infinite ki regen
'A form far beyond comprehension, only available to the true god Nuova.'
SSJSBuff.TipTranslation: 69倍伤害，69倍速度，给予无限的气恢复

DisgustingGoopBuff.Name: Disgusting Goop
DisgustingGoopBuff.Tip: Your ki seems stablized, but you also feel sick.
DisgustingGoopBuff.TipTranslation: 你的气看起来很稳定，但是你觉得很恶心

EnhancedReserves.Name: Enhanced Reserves
EnhancedReserves.Tip: Your ki reserves have been enhanced.
EnhancedReserves.TipTranslation: 你的气上限得到了提升.

KaiokenBuff.Name: Kaioken
KaiokenBuff.TipTranslation: 减少一倍的伤害速度和气的消耗

KatchinFeet.Name: Katchin Feet
KatchinFeet.Tip: Your feet are infused with ki, making them as hard as katchin.
KatchinFeet.TipTranslation: 你的脚上布满了气和Katchin立方体一样坚硬.

KiPotionSickness.Name: Ki Potion Sickness
KiPotionSickness.Tip: You feel sick at the thought of another ki potion.

KiStimulantBuff.Name: Ki Stimulance
KiStimulantBuff.Tip: Your body is enhanced, passively regenerating ki.
KiStimulantBuff.TipTranslation: 身体增强然后被动的恢复气.

LegendaryTrait.Name: Legendary
LegendaryTrait.Tip: You are the saiyan of legend.

MREBuff.Name: MRE
MREBuff.Tip: You feel extremely full and super refreshed.

NimbusBuff.Name: Nimbus Cloud
NimbusBuff.Tip: Only Those With True Hearts Can Ride This.

ProdigyTrait.Name: Prodigy
ProdigyTrait.Tip:
You are truly gifted.
Faster mastery gains.
ProdigyTrait.TipTranslation:
你很有天赋.
能快速掌握要点.

SenzuCooldown.Name: Senzu Cooldown
SenzuCooldown.Tip: You feel too sick to eat another senzu.
SenzuCooldown.TipTranslation: 你需要等待一段时间才能再吃下一颗仙豆

ASSJBuff.Name: Ascended Super Saiyan
ASSJBuff.Tip:
Damage +75% Speed +75%
Ki Costs +40%
Ki Drain: 69/s, 34/s when mastered
ASSJBuff.TipTranslation:
伤害速度提升75%
气消耗增加40%
气放出: 69/s, 当你是大师的时候降为34/s

LSSJ2Buff.Name: Legendary Super Saiyan 2
LSSJ2Buff.Tip:
Damage +220% Speed +220%
Ki Costs +190%
Ki Drain: 180/s
LSSJ2Buff.TipTranslation:
伤害速度提升220%
气消耗增加190%
气放出: 180/s

LSSJBuff.Name: Legendary Super Saiyan
LSSJBuff.Tip:
Damage +130% Speed +130%
Ki Costs +110%
Ki Drain: 129/s
LSSJBuff.TipTranslation:
伤害速度提升130%
气消耗增加110%
气放出: 129/s

SSJ1Buff.Name: Super Saiyan
SSJ1Buff.Tip:
Damage +50% Speed +50%
Ki Costs +25%
Ki Drain: 60/s, 30/s when mastered
SSJ1Buff.TipTranslation:
伤害速度提升50%
气消耗增加25%
气放出: 60/s, 当你是大师的时候降为30/s

SSJ2Buff.Name: Super Saiyan 2
SSJ2Buff.Tip:
Damage +125% Speed +125%
Ki Costs +62%
Ki Drain: 120/s, 60/s when mastered
SSJ2Buff.TipTranslation:
伤害速度提升125%
气消耗增加62%
气放出: 120/s, 当你是大师的时候降为60/s

SSJ3Buff.Name: Super Saiyan 3
SSJ3Buff.Tip:
Damage +190% Speed +190%
Ki Costs +95%
Ki Drain: 159/s, 80/s when mastered
(Life drains when below 30% Max Ki)
SSJ3Buff.TipTranslation:
伤害速度提升190%
气消耗增加95%
气放出: 159/s, 当你是大师的时候降为80/s
(生命少于30% 消耗气上限)

SSJGBuff.Name: Super Saiyan God
SSJGBuff.Tip:
Damage +250% Speed +250%
Ki Costs +50%
Ki Drain: 135/s, 99/s when mastered
Slightly increased health regen.
SSJGBuff.TipTranslation:
伤害速度提升250%
气消耗增加50%
气放出: 135/s, 当你是大师的时候降为99/s
略微增加生命恢复.

SuperKaiokenBuff.Name: Super Kaioken
SuperKaiokenBuff.Tip:
Damage +125% Speed +125%
Ki Costs +62%
Ki Drain: 120/s, 60/s when mastered
SuperKaiokenBuff.TipTranslation:
伤害速度提升125%
气消耗增加62%
气放出: 120/s, 当你是大师的时候降为60/s

USSJBuff.Name: Ultra Super Saiyan
USSJBuff.Tip:
Damage +90% Speed -10%
Ki Costs +60%
Ki Drain: 90/s, 45/s when mastered
USSJBuff.TipTranslation:
伤害增加90% 速度减少10%
气消耗增加60%
气放出: 90/s, 当你是大师的时候降为45/s

TiredDebuff.Name: Exhausted
TiredDebuff.Tip: You have used too much Ki.

TransExhaustionBuff.Name: Transformation Exhaustion
TransExhaustionBuff.Tip: Your body can't handle another transformation.

UIOmenBuff.Name: Ultra Instinct -Sign-
UIOmenBuff.Tip: The secret technique of the gods. Grants the ability to dodge any attack.

UnknownLegendary.Tip: Your body seems a bit special.
UnknownLegendary.TipTranslation: 你的身体看起来有点特别.

ZenkaiBuff.Name: Zenkai
ZenkaiBuff.Tip: Your inherent saiyan ability is active.
ZenkaiBuff.TipTranslation: 你的赛亚人能力看起来很活跃.

ZenkaiCooldown.Name: Zenkai Cooldown
ZenkaiCooldown.Tip: Your zenkai ability is on cooldown.
ZenkaiCooldown.TipTranslation: 你的全开能力正在降低冷却时间.
